table_description: Holds project information including budgets, deadlines, descriptions, and links to companies and personnel.

table_columns.name: account_id
table_columns.description: Identifier for the account associated with the project.

table_columns.name: budget_type
table_columns.description: Specifies the type of budget for the project.

table_columns.name: color
table_columns.description: Color code or label associated with the project.

table_columns.name: company_id
table_columns.description: Identifier for the company linked to the project.

table_columns.name: company_name
table_columns.description: Name of the company associated with the project.

table_columns.name: currency
table_columns.description: Currency code used for the project budget and financials.

table_columns.name: date
table_columns.description: Date associated with the project record (e.g., start date).

table_columns.name: deadline
table_columns.description: Deadline or due date for the project.

table_columns.name: description
table_columns.description: Detailed description of the project.

table_columns.name: duration
table_columns.description: Duration or time span for the project.

table_columns.name: id
table_columns.description: DONT USE THIS COLUMN FOR ANYTHING. IN QUERY

table_columns.name: is_private
table_columns.description: Indicator if the project is private (e.g., 1 for private, 0 for public).

table_columns.name: is_role_based
table_columns.description: Indicates if project access is role-based.

table_columns.name: manager_email
table_columns.description: Email address of the project manager.

table_columns.name: manager_id
table_columns.description: Identifier for the project manager.

table_columns.name: modified_date
table_columns.description: Timestamp when the project record was last modified.

table_columns.name: no
table_columns.description: DONT USE THIS COLUMN FOR ANYTHING. IN QUERY

table_columns.name: owner_email
table_columns.description: Email address of the project owner.

table_columns.name: person_id
table_columns.description: Identifier for the contact associated with the project.VERY IMPORTANT: treat this column as primary key like 'id' for table.

table_columns.name: person_name
table_columns.description: Name of the contact associated with the project.

table_columns.name: status
table_columns.description: DONT USE THIS COLUMN FOR ANYTHING. IN QUERY

table_columns.name: status_name
table_columns.description: Descriptive name of the project status.

table_columns.name: project_name
table_columns.description: Name or title of the project.
